author: Scott Monich
title: Dairy farm worker found dead in manure tank - London | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 21, 2017 5:26 pm Updated: February 21, 2017 10:59 pm Dairy farm worker found dead in manure tank What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
The Ontario Ministry of Labour has been contacted following a deadly industrial accident on a dairy farm just southwest of London. 
OPP responded to an incident at a rural property on Woodhull Rd. shortly before 2 p.m. Tuesday. 
A worker at the farm was unaccounted for and efforts were made to locate them, according to police. 
The unidentified worker was found dead in a manure holding tank. 
Their identity isn’t being released until next-of-kin have been notified. 
Officials from the Ontario Ministry of Labour will be attending the scene. © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
